hackathon.title: BEST::HACKath0n —
hackathon.description: an event where IT students team up to create a new software product within 24 hours in a non-stop programming format.
hackathon.second_description: This is one of the most interesting formats of the competition, as teams have to create their project in a short time and be able to present it successfully. It is a good opportunity for students to improve their teamwork skills, meets like-minded people, and communicate with company representatives.
hackathon.volonteer_descreption: This year's theme of the programming marathon, "Volunteering", provides students with a unique opportunity to participate in the current social process. Participants will focus on developing creative and innovative solutions that will help increase the effectiveness and popularity of volunteering in Ukraine. Volunteerism plays a key role in helping people and communities by engaging in a variety of areas, from charity to the environment. However, volunteerism faces several challenges that need to be addressed.

benefits.opportunity_to_sup: Opportunity to find and support interesting ideas on the theme of volunteering
benefits.investment_in_people: Investment in ambitious and talented young people

statistics.registered_users: Number of users who completed the full registration process
statistics.selected_teams: Number of teams that passed the selection

reviews.tsukat_review: The event was an effective networking event that gave the first results almost immediately, the organizers were quick to respond to changes and issued an excellent report. In general, we have positive impressions.
reviews.osf_review: Good event, it was an interesting experience for us.
reviews.keepit_review: We liked the event and were inspired by it.

target_audience.topic: Information about the target audience of BEST::Hackathon

AUDIENCE_INFO.title: General Information:
list: 52% of participants have work experience in their specialty
92% of participants are programmers by profession

Offers.title: Basic
list: Company logo on the brandwoll and the project website.
Promotion in social networks (information about the company)
Logo and mention of the company in the post-project video

Offers.title: Recruiter
list: Sending vacancies in a Telegram bot
Access to the CV database of participants

Offers.title: Initiator
list: Providing a mentor and a judge
Conducting a workshop or training (25-45 minutes)
Post about the company on Instagram

Basic.title: Company logo on the brandwoll and the project website.
Basic.text: Placement of the partner's logo on the project branding and website of the Hackathon

Basic.title: Promotion on social networks (company information)
Basic.text:
Posting information about the company on social networks: 
 a. 1 mention in Instagram story 
 b. 1 post on LinkedIn 
c. Post digest in the Telegram channel

Basic.title: Logo and mention of the company in the post-project video
Basic.text: Adding the company logo to the video that will be created and posted on Instagram after the successful completion of the Hackathon. The company and its contribution to the event will also be mentioned in the video.

Basic.title: Participation in networking
Basic.text: Networking is a means of meeting between participants, organizers, and company representatives in an informal setting, which can be a great opportunity for students to find a job or internship, and for companies to provide these opportunities. The time of the event is approximately one hour.

Initiator.title: Providing a mentor and judge
Initiator.text: A mentor is a person who has experience and knowledge in the field in which the team works. They help participants solve problems that arise during the development of the project. a judge is a person who evaluates the projects developed by the teams during the hackathon. They evaluate the quality of implementation, relevance to the hackathon topic, innovation, practical value, and other parameters.

Initiator.title: Conducting a workshop or training
Initiator.text: A workshop is a type of interactive learning where participants perform a series of learning activities. For example, it can be a demonstration, a practical lesson, or a discussion club. Training is a certain type of learning that aims to increase the level of knowledge and skills of participants. Its main goal is to teach techniques, methods, and strategies that can be useful for solving specific problems. For example, training in communication techniques, project management, web technologies, etc.

Initiator.title: Logo on T-shirts
Initiator.text: Your and other companies' logos will be printed on the backs of the T-shirts of all people attending the event, which they will receive at the opening of the hackathon.

Initiator.title: Nomination from the company
Initiator.text: You can choose your nomination for the competition, which will be assigned to your company. The winner is determined by the company's representative and awarded with a prize. The nomination may relate to the use of certain technologies or other features of the team's work of your choice.

Initiator.title: Post about the company on Instagram
Initiator.text: We will publish a post about your company on our Instagram page that will be available forever. In this post, we will provide information about your company and note that you are one of our main partners in this hackathon.

Recruiter.title: Sending vacancies in a Telegram bot
Recruiter.text: Semi-annual mailing of vacancies and activities (courses, internships) from the company in the Telegram bot.

Recruiter.title: Access to the CV database of participants
Recruiter.text: This is an opportunity to access the CV database of participants who have been selected for the hackathon.

Get to know.title: World cafe
Get to know.text: This is a method of interaction between a group of people aimed at co-creating and exchanging ideas through conversations on a predetermined topic in a relaxed atmosphere. The company will be allocated 15 minutes to interact with the participants.

Get to know.title: Interactive insta-stories
Get to know.text: Together with our team, we will create content to promote Instagram stories on the organization's page*. Examples of interactive content: "Question and Answer" section; "How our employee's day goes" section, etc.

Get to know.title: Task of the day
Get to know.text: The Hackathon team will post a creative task on behalf of your company on our Instagram. Examples of tasks: come up with a slogan for the company, draw an alternative logo, create an original photo on a specific topic, etc. Afterward, we will select a winner who will be able to receive your merchandise during the event.

service_packages.charitable_collection: Everyone who becomes a partner in our project has the opportunity to join a charity collection raffle for the Armed Forces on our social media. Winners will be randomly selected among the people who donate and receive gifts from partner companies. Also, after the successful completion of the Hackathon, you will receive a photo and video report from the organizers.
service_packages.NBU_course: *Payment will be made at the NBU exchange rate
service_packages.ZSU: 10% of the proceeds will go to help the Ukrainian Armed Forces!

QA.question: Will the event be paused in the event of a power outage?
QA.answer: The hackathon will not stop, the power supply will be provided by the generator.

QA.question: Will there be a shelter that is the right size for all participants?
QA.answer: Yes, in case of an air raid, the organizers will guide all participants to the shelter.

Best.information: — is a chapter of an international non-profit public organization that brings together students of technical specialties. Our mission is to develop students through the exchange of knowledge and cooperation between companies, universities, and students in Europe.
